content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5)

### Copper Production Line around position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (copper ore) (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5)

### Iron Production Line around position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (iron ore) (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5)

### Power Generation System around position(-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting water and steam
- Electrical network connecting multiple entities

### Automation Science Pack Production around position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5)
- Additional storage chest (6.5, 14.5)
- Multiple belt groups for item transport

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items like coal or other materials
- Collect required items from storage before attempting insertion operations

### Errors when trying to extract items from storage
- Verify that the target chest contains the desired items before extraction
- Check the exact position of storage chests when attempting extraction

### Errors when trying to access entities at wrong positions
- Ensure correct coordinates when trying to access entities like labs
- Verify entity positions before attempting operations on them

### Entity status related issues
- Monitor fuel levels in burner entities to prevent "NO_FUEL" status
- Ensure all required ingredients are available for assembling machines to prevent "ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE"
- Keep track of input/output chest contents to maintain production flow
